alert.note: Alert for Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:33AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pottawattamie County through 600 AM CDT... At 533 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carson, or 21 miles northwest of Red Oak, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Pottawattamie County, including the following locations... Farm Creek Public Wildlife Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
